Summary: I saw a white disc flying in circles in the northwest sky. When the object flew away from me, it looked as if it were black.
trends: There have been no other sightings in West Pleasant View
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was running in the park and got winded so I sat down and took a break. I started to look toward the pretty Colorado blue sky and saw a white object flying in circles going NW to NE and back. There was no sound. When the object flew away from me it appeared as if it were black. I started running towards it, but it flew away.
